title: AutoScreenRecorder 3.0
description: This is an awsome screen recorder. Good for wanting to make a video than putting it on another website(Youtube). You can Record using the FULL SCREEN, SELECTED AREA, OBJECT/WINDOW, AND THE ACTIVE WINDOW. Saves as a .avi file and plays with WINDOWS MEDIA PLAYER. If you wan't to EDIT your movie, you can go on WINDOWS MOVIE MAKER and make cool effects.
